msbt.message: So this is a clown fish, huh? It's cute! Packs a lot of style into a small package.
Whoa, I've never seen a whole aquarium of these little beauties swimming around before Are they trainable?
Ahh, a sea butterfly! These are almost like underwater angels
Ooh, a koi fish. These little guys really know how to use contrast to maximum effect.
They say that guppies are the puppies of tropical fish.Do you think it's just because of the rhyme?
Look at the fins on that betta It's like a classic car combined with a fish. Vroom, vroom!
So this is a surgeonfish, huh? I hate to see the bill
So they call this a stringfish, is that right? I meanit's not THAT skinny.
I guess they call this fish a living fossil or something, right? That's so cool! Its real name isn't bad either. Try saying it out loudâ€”arapaima. It rolllllls off the tongue.
You know you've done something really good or really bad when you have a fish named after you. So I wonder what that Napoleonfish guy was like
Yo, that's a huge ocean sunfish! I mean, I guess they're all huge, so maybe it's actually a small one
Have you ever noticed that it looks like the whale shark is wearing a very stylish suit? Wish I could wear my best suit underwater and have it look that good!
Ooh, an arowana! These guys are endangered, so just looking at 'em is like being at a VIP room.
The coelacanth is so old that it's back in style again.
I can't imagine coming across a char this big out in the water. This guy must have been a boss, huh?
Yikes! I don't like the way that piranha is looking at me
Yow! I'd hate to get bitten by that great white shark! <10_4 />Aw, I bet everyone who sees him says that. Poor guy
Whoa, so this is a mahi-mahi? It's cool that I can see one here, since I'll never catch one on my own.
Can you imagine trying to paddle a boat with this oarfish?You may not get far, but you'd have the most stylish oars around.
GAH!<10_4 /> Oh, sorry. I don't know what came over me when I saw that thing.I guess I just went into fight or flight mode, you know? Only my "fight" is more like "cry."
So that's a gar, huh? It's actually kind of stylish for having a sort of unstylish name.
You know, the more I look at that hammerhead shark, the more I want to BE a hammerhead shark
Oh yeah, this was one of your donations, wasn't it? Good on you, !
